definition: characterized by or constituting a form of government in which power is held by one central authority
details:
adjective
- characterized by or constituting a form of government in which power is held by one central authority
= example: characterized by or constituting a form of government in which power is held by one central authority
- having the indivisible character of a unit
= example: having the indivisible character of a unit
= synonyms: one
- of or pertaining to or involving the use of units
= example: of or pertaining to or involving the use of units
- relating to or characterized by or aiming toward unity
= example: relating to or characterized by or aiming toward unity
